snippet: In order to replace the dismal and inadequate Pennsylvania Station, the massive sports arena should not be given a new lease. It should move.
abstract: Editorial urges New York City to extend lease for Madison Square Garden for no more than 10 years, so that it can be eventually moved; holds presence of structure, sitting atop dismal and inadequate Pennsylvania Station, makes much-needed renovation of station impossible.
lead_paragraph: In order to replace the dismal and inadequate Pennsylvania Station, the massive sports arena should not be given a new lease. It should move.
